Setup

```{r setup, include = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(patchwork)
library(knitr)
library(sf)
library(lubridate)
library(stringr)
```


```{r load evictions data}
evic = read.csv("./data/evictions.csv")

uhf = st_read("./UHF_42_DOHMH_2009/UHF_42_DOHMH_2009.shp")
```

```{r rename and clean}
evic =janitor::clean_names(evic)

uhf = janitor::clean_names(uhf)

# change date format
evic$executed_date <- mdy(evic$executed_date)
```

#### EDA

```{r Eviction EDA}
# eviction by boroughs

citibike |>
  group_by(year, month,member_casual) |>
  summarize(number_of_rides = n())|>
  knitr::kable(col.names = c("year", "month", "member", "number of rides"))

```
